concept.title: Specify connection credentials
concept.shortdesc: To run on target nodes that require a username and password, pass credentials as options on the command line.

conbody.p: connects to remote nodes with either SSH or WinRM.
You can manage SSH connections with an SSH configuration file (~/.ssh/config) on your workstation, or you can specify the username and password on the command line.
WinRM connections always require you to pass the username and password with the bolt command:

example.p: To have securely prompt for a password, use the --password or -p flag without supplying any value. then prompts for the password, so that it does not appear in a process listing or on the console.
